snippet: The Senate voted on Wednesday to approve a procedural measure limiting debate on the nomination of Sylvia Mathews Burwell as secretary of health and human services.
abstract: Senate votes to approve a procedural measure limiting debate on the nomination of Sylvia Mathews Burwell as secretary of health and human services to no more than 30 hours.
lead_paragraph: The Senate voted on Wednesday to approve a procedural measure limiting debate on the nomination of Sylvia Mathews Burwell as secretary of health and human services.

headline.main: Path Cleared for Senate Vote on New Health Secretary
headline.print_headline: Path Cleared for Health Secretary Vote
